<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:697824b54f363300c09fb8de9310c705</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CargarCamposBynameMonitorBCR</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	//MostrarMonitorByName32
	
	var valor_Modificar = g_form.getValue('monitor_de_salud_a_modificar');
	if(valor_Modificar != '-- NINGUNO --'){
		//set to read Only
	//	g_form.setMandatory('nombre_del_servidor_virtual',true);
		//g_form.setReadOnly('nombre_del_servidor_virtual',true);
		//g_form.setReadOnly('n_mero_de_servicegroup_a_enlazar',true);
		
		
		
		// setRead Only nombre serviceGrouyp
		var ga = new GlideAjax('MostrarMonitorByName32');
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "listarMonitorByname");
		ga.addParam('sysparm_JSON_data',valor_Modificar);
		ga.getXML(getResponse);
			
	}else{
		//g_form.setReadOnly('nombre_del_servidor_virtual',false);
		//g_form.setReadOnly('n_mero_de_servicegroup_a_enlazar',false);
		
	}
	
	
	// aqui carga por campos 
	function getResponse(response) {
		
		var values = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		
		var valor = values.split(',');
		
		//var virtualServerName = valor[0];
		var tipoProtocolo = valor[1];
		//var IP = valor[2];
		
		//options
		/*
		
		0: "KevsanBCR2019"
1: "HTTP"
2: "HEAD /"
3: "500"
4: "3"



0: "de"
1: "TCP"
2: ""
3: ""
4: "2"

		*/
	
		
		//agrego a los campos el dato
		g_form.setValue('nombre_del_monitor', valor[0]);
		g_form.setValue('tipo_de_protocolo', valor[1]);
		g_form.setValue('http_request', valor[2]);
		g_form.setValue('response_codes', valor[3]);
		g_form.setValue('response_time_out', valor[4]);

	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-22 22:51:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c950857d4f763300c09fb8de9310c76c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CargarCamposBynameMonitorBCR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c950857d4f763300c09fb8de9310c76c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>701980296</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-10 15:22:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
